reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: New Zealand Police as part of the European Union Policing Mission in Afghanistan provided mentoring and capacity building support to the Afghan National Police (ANP) and the Regional Training Centre in Bamyan Province to improve community safety and access to justice.
